description:
The AWS Command Line Interface is a unified tool that provides a consistent interface for interacting with all parts of AWS.

aws [options] service operation [parameters]

Use 'aws service help' for information on a specific service.

--endpoint-url.help: Override service's default URL with the given URL

--no-verify-ssl.help: Override default behavior of verifying SSL certificates

--profile.help: Use a specific profile from your credential file

--version.help: Display the version of this tool
